did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, records, photographs, newspaper clippings, and printed items.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Physician of Philadelphia, Jefferson County, N.Y.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Record of births and deaths of patients (1 v., 1880-1944); scrapbook of newspaper clippings, snapshots and photographs, letters, programs, and other otems (1 v., 1911-1945) of articles appearing in THE NORTH COUNTRY ADVANCE (1944-1945) and containing Dr. Rodenhurst's recollections of Philadelphia, New York, around 1880; printed items pertaining to the medical profession.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial PDF finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
